pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cramer von Mises Tests for Discrete or Grouped Distributions // Implements Cramer-von Mises Statistics for testing fit to (1) fully specified discrete distributions as described in Choulakian, Lockhart and Stephens (1994) doi:10.2307/3315828 (2) discrete distributions with unknown parameters that must be estimated from the sample data, see Spinelli Stephens (1997) doi:10.2307/3315735 and Lockhart, Spinelli and Stephens (2007) doi:10.1002/cjs.5550350111 (3) grouped continuous distributions with Unknown Parameters, see Spinelli (2001) doi:10.2307/3316040. Maximum likelihood estimation (MLE) is used to estimate the parameters. The package computes the Cramer-von Mises Statistics, Anderson-Darling Statistics and the Watson-Stephens Statistics and their p-values.
